body: There are 9 ch of this.  Can't find ch 6 or 8 and 9 translated anybody help?
One day the rest will get translated . Hopefully
I've read this a few times already and can't get enough of it! Still waiting for the remaining pages to be TL'd *crosses fingers*
....heh! Hentai Logic, at its best! not that i minded tho~
Aaaahhh nice, I really wanna live in that apartment. Is this the last chapter?

no obata senpai please don't go (༎ຶ ෴ ༎ຶ) i loved it the best plot ever, just couldn't get enough of the hot sex scenes & 3 somes, 4 somes this artist is a god everything is just picture perfect if one think could be better was just perfect coloring but hey I'm not complaining it's already one of the best god i wish i could draw like this •́  ‿ ,•̀
Continue translating other chapters please. I want to know why the bitch cheated and why he brought her back
Oh this was released in english as Hard Temptation by Poject Hentai, both digital and physical
I will wait for a complete translation. About 90 pages remaining

well oh well now we can comment then. let me give a warning, this work is pretty nice early on the good old wish fulfillment kinda of story.
but when i looked into the story long time ago and i mean the RAWS it's seems like the dude get's NTR'D somehow. not sure how and why.
as i couldn't read. but unless i somehow fked up here. and even tho our MC saw it and i could be wrong but he does nothing but leaves there.
and somehow our MC harem's bring that fucking bitch back to him and they are good now.'even if she was forced by the dude that's just fked up '
and by fked up i mean the author's taste. fking a nice work

I love how Auntie kind of pimps him out but still has to her share of the D. And what the fuck is up with Obata-senpai on the last page- isn't she supposed to get turned on by the scene in front of her? Hentai logic has failed us!
